Description of the Extension

 Overview:
This browser extension, named "Save Board," is designed to help users manage and store snippets of text easily. It allows users to add, edit, lock, delete, and copy text snippets, as well as change their background colors for better organization. Additionally, it offers functionality to paste the saved text into active input fields or content-editable elements on any webpage.

 Features:
1. Add New Snippets: Users can add new text entries which will be stored locally in the browser.
2. Edit Snippets: Text entries are editable unless they are locked.
3. Lock/Unlock Snippets: Users can lock snippets to prevent editing. Locked snippets can be unlocked as needed.
4. Delete Snippets: Users can delete snippets that are not locked.
5. Copy to Clipboard: Each snippet has a "Copy" button to quickly copy the text to the clipboard.
6. Paste into Fields: Users can paste the saved text into any active input field, textarea, or content-editable element on the current webpage.
7. Change Background Color**: Users can change the background color of each snippet for better organization.
8. Resizable Text Box: The default height of each text box is set to 1300px, but users can resize it as needed.
9. Clear All: Users can clear all unlocked snippets with a single click.
10. Notification: Displays a notification when text is copied to the clipboard.

Usage:
- Add New Text: Click the "Add New" button, type the desired text in the input field, and press the enter button (→) to save.
- Edit Text: Click inside the text box to edit the text if it is not locked.
- Lock/Unlock Text**: Click the "Lock" button to prevent changes to the text. Click "Unlock" to allow editing.
- Delete Text: Click the "Delete" button to remove the text. This button is disabled if the text is locked.
- Copy Text: Click the "Copy" button to copy the text to the clipboard.
- Paste Text: Click the "Paste" button to paste the text into the currently active input field or content-editable element on the webpage.
- Change Color: Click the move handle (☰) to open the color picker, and select a color to change the background of the text box.
- Clear All Texts: Click the "Clear All" button to remove all unlocked texts after confirmation.

This extension is perfect for users who need to keep and manage multiple text snippets for quick access and insertion into various web forms, making it ideal for tasks like data entry, content creation, and more.
